content: I think I'll go with the dry Riesling from the Finger Lakes region in New York and the Pinot Grigio from Italy. They both sound like great options for my truffle gouda and variety of crackers and breads. By the way, my "Summer Sunset" cocktail was a huge hit at my dinner party, I served it in a big batch and everyone was asking for refills, it's definitely a crowd-pleaser.
